name: Alula
0:
”Alexa, ask My Security System for status.”
”Alexa, tell My Security System to disarm.”
”Alexa, tell My Security System to arm.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: my security system
Developer Terms of Use
des: Control your Alula Connect+ security system with Alexa. Arm, disarm and request system status all with your voice. This skill requires a compatible Connect+ security solution from Alula and linking of your Alula account credentials provided by your professional security dealer.
